amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to support the transition of servicemembers to the civilian workforce by streamlining the process associated with Federal and State credentialing requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 366 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 366 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator McCaskill.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 366 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 366 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator McCaskill.
